DOC.brief_summary: This phase 3 , open-label , randomize study evaluate safety efficacy Lilly/Alkermes inhale insulin system compare injected pre-meal insulin non-smoking patient type 2 diabetes . Patients treat 24 month 2-month follow-up period .
DOC.brief_title: Study Human Insulin Inhalation Powder Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes Non smoker Normal lung function Pulmonary , hepatic , renal disease Congestive heart failure Active malignancy Systemic glucocorticoid therapy
